Token.Abstract: Service for access to iTunes Store.
Set delegate to recieve result of query.

Parameter.Name: anObject
Parameter.Abstract: delegate object with ITunesSearchApiDelegate protocol.

Token.Abstract: Execute query for return musics tracks from iTunes Store and return results to the delagate.

Parameter.Name: searchTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc

Parameter.Name: async
Parameter.Abstract: true if you want asynchronization mode

Token.Abstract: Execute query in iTunes Store and return music track with this id to the delagate.

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: id of the music track to find

Parameter.Name: async
Parameter.Abstract: true if you want asynchronization mode

Token.Abstract: Execute query in iTunes Store and return music track with this album id to the delagate.

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: id of the album to find

Parameter.Name: async
Parameter.Abstract: true if you want asynchronization mode

Token.Abstract: Execute query in iTunes Store and return music track with this artist id to the delagate.

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: id of the artist to find

Parameter.Name: async
Parameter.Abstract: true if you want asynchronization mode

Token.Abstract: Execute query for return albums from iTunes Store and return results to the delagate.

Parameter.Name: searchTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc

Parameter.Name: async
Parameter.Abstract: true if you want asynchronization mode

Token.Abstract: Execute query in iTunes Store and return music track with this id to the delagate.

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: id of the music track to find

Parameter.Name: async
Parameter.Abstract: true if you want asynchronization mode

Token.Abstract: Execute query in iTunes Store and return all album for an artist with this id to the delagate.

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: id of the music track to find

Parameter.Name: async
Parameter.Abstract: true if you want asynchronization mode

Token.Abstract: Execute query in iTunes Store and return all artist for an searchterm.

Parameter.Name: searchTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc.

Parameter.Name: async
Parameter.Abstract: true if you want asynchronization mode.

Token.Abstract: Build searchterm for find song in iTunes Store.

Parameter.Name: mediaitem
Parameter.Abstract: MediaItem that you expect find in store.

Token.Abstract: Configuration of the connection with the iTunes Store API.
Make request to the iTunes Store with searchTerm and filterTerm in Asych mode.

Parameter.Name: searchTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc: https://www.apple.com/itunes/affiliates/resources/documentation/itunes-store-web-service-search-api.html

Parameter.Name: filterTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc: https://www.apple.com/itunes/affiliates/resources/documentation/itunes-store-web-service-search-api.html

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: Type of query.

Token.Abstract: Make request to the iTunes Store with searchTerm and filterTerm in Asych mode.

Parameter.Name: searchTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc: https://www.apple.com/itunes/affiliates/resources/documentation/itunes-store-web-service-search-api.html

Parameter.Name: filterTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc: https://www.apple.com/itunes/affiliates/resources/documentation/itunes-store-web-service-search-api.html

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: Type of query.

Token.Abstract: Build valid URL to search on itune store api.

Parameter.Name: searchTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc: https://www.apple.com/itunes/affiliates/resources/documentation/itunes-store-web-service-search-api.html

Parameter.Name: filterTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc: https://www.apple.com/itunes/affiliates/resources/documentation/itunes-store-web-service-search-api.html

ReturnValue.Abstract: valid url request to call RKObjectRequestOperation initWithRequest.

Token.Abstract: Build valid URL to search on itune store api with a unique id of item.

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: id of a item in store

Parameter.Name: filterTerm
Parameter.Abstract: see itunes api doc: https://www.apple.com/itunes/affiliates/resources/documentation/itunes-store-web-service-search-api.html

ReturnValue.Abstract: valid url request to call RKObjectRequestOperation initWithRequest.
